definition: a person or thing that receives help or an advantage from something : one that benefits from something
examples: the main beneficiaries of these economic reforms

definition: the person designated to receive the income of an estate that is subject to a trust (see trust entry 1 sense 3a)
the person named (as in an insurance policy) to receive proceeds or benefits (see benefit entry 1 sense 2b)
examples: named her husband as the sole beneficiary of her life insurance policy
